StringSet.String:
To ensure that your keystrokes cannot be detected by any other computer, you must complete the secure encryption wizard.

Just follow these simple steps. The wizard will only take a moment to complete.

Do not press any keys other than keys required by the wizard.

To ensure that your keystrokes cannot be detected by any other computer, you must complete the secure encryption wizard.

Just follow these simple steps. The wizard will only take a moment to complete.

Do not press any keys other than keys required by the wizard.

To ensure that your keystrokes cannot be detected by any other computer, you must complete the secure encryption wizard.

Just follow these simple steps. The wizard will only take a moment to complete.

Do not press any keys other than keys required by the wizard.

To ensure that your keystrokes cannot be detected by any other computer, you must complete the secure encryption wizard.

Just follow these simple steps. The wizard will only take a moment to complete.

Do not press any keys other than keys required by the wizard.
Sorry, the Numeric Pad's battery level is too low to secure your Numeric Keypad. Please replace your batteries and then try again.
On your Numeric Pad, hold down the Calc button for 3 seconds.
Press the connect button on the bottom of your Numeric Pad.
The Numeric Pad connection is now secure. Click Finish to exit the wizard.

Dialog.Control: Sorry, the keyboard's battery level is too low to secure your keyboard. Please replace your batteries and then try again.
On your keyboard, press the left <CTRL> + left <ALT> + <F12> keys.
Press the connect button on the bottom of your keyboard.
Enter the following code in the boxes below.
The keyboard connection is now secure. Click Finish to exit the wizard.
